name: Hearts of Iron III: For the Motherland
name_original: Hearts of Iron III: For the Motherland
description:
Hearts of Iron III: For the Motherland is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It came out on 28-06-2011. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Hearts of Iron III: For the Motherland on PC.
It was produced by Johan Andersson. It was scored by Andreas Waldetoft.
